data.text: @SteeleDaddy Enjoy the freedom of doing both!

@MpoppEileen My wife is a tenured biology professor and well-published scientist who studied viruses during her post-doc at an Ivy League university and my opinions are largely based on discussions with her. My degrees are in experimental research/statistics, so I can speak on prob/risk ✌🏻
@SteeleDaddy Says Dr. Steele, esteemed infectious disease expert?

@SteeleDaddy Today I saw a family that stays almost fully isolated, working and schooling from home, only leaving the house with masks for essential appointments (like therapy with me,) in FL where that is not typical. Mother said she doesn't want kid to get the vax. This gives me hope.
@SteeleDaddy The first ad had a kid about 5 shoving a swab up their nose. Go to their page, sick profiteering bastards. Of course they're angling for public funding.
@dee_white Jesus. They really don’t want to let this go.
@SteeleDaddy Ppl are actually laughing at scientific articles starting kids are low risk https://t.co/Yc1RJmtxzf

I know I repeat myself a lot on the kids stuff, but I simply cannot fucking believe that parents would inject a vaccine under EUA into their kids—when their kids *literally* are not in danger from C19 & aren’t vectors of spread (thus, no “emergency”).
